definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute if entity @e[type=!armor_stand,tag=LOTW-ally,tag=!LOTW-user] run tellraw @p[tag=LOTW-user] ["",{"text":"Lantern ally list includes ","color":"dark_green"},{"text":"","color":"gray","extra":[{"selector":"@e[type=!armor_stand,tag=LOTW-ally,tag=!LOTW-user]"}]}]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
